item.description:
Please note the 10:00AM set time is a place holder for now.  Depending on how my want to do this will depend on where they fit our group in that day.

There are three tour levels:

Base Area 1Hour $30 Adult

Mountain Top 3 Hours $85 Adult

Valley Jumping Tour 3.5 Hours $110 Adult

If there are more than 10 in the group we can get a small discount and though part of the same group you can pick what ever level you would like.

check out the website for more details and watch the tour video!

http://berkshireeast.com/zip_tour_mountain

 

Please RSVP by July 25th so the appropriate reservations can be made.
item.name: Canopy Zipline Tour
